interactivity.to_get_this_event: Autoplays after " Escape Rope " . This event belongs to an event chain started from " Girls in Spandex " .

progression.synopsis: After following Molly in order to make her feel better, Sensei starts to "blackout".
trivia: During this scene, Sensei is supposedly "given" 6000000 Molly Affection. Checking the in-game profile for Molly reveals that these affection points have been added to Molly's existing count. They are removed soon after acquisition.

changelog: This Event was added in Update .20p2.
